scripts.build: npm run build:pre && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:declarations && npm run build:cp
scripts.build:watch: npm run build:pre && npm run build:cp && tsc --watch --module es2015 --outDir ./dist/esm
scripts.build:watch:cjs: npm run build:pre && npm run build:cp && tsc --watch  --module commonjs --outDir ./dist/cjs
scripts.build:cp: cp -r res dist/esm && cp -r res dist/cjs && cp lib/scripting/grammar/grammar.bnf dist/cjs/lib/scripting/grammar && cp lib/scripting/grammar/grammar.bnf dist/esm/lib/scripting/grammar
scripts.build:pre: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist/esm/lib/scripting/grammar && mkdirp dist/cjs/lib/scripting/grammar && node build/write-info.js && node build/compile-rules.js
scripts.test: node build/compile-rules.js && tsc && cross-env TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true nyc mocha --config test/mocha.ts.json "lib/**/*.spec.ts"
scripts.test:watch: npm run build:pre && npm run build:cp && tsc-watch --module commonjs --outDir ./dist/cjs --onFirstSuccess "mocha --config test/mocha.js.json dist/cjs/lib/**/*.spec.js"
scripts.test:watch:debug: npm run build:pre && npm run build:cp && tsc-watch --module commonjs --outDir ./dist/cjs --onFirstSuccess "mocha --config test/mocha.js.json --inspect dist/cjs/lib/**/*.spec.js"
